name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Cold planing shall be carried out in a manner such that a uniform surface is present on a plane parallel with the ultimate finished surface of the pavement
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure average depth of pavement removed is in accordance with relevant methodologies. Ensure a maximum of 50mm to be removed per pass.
After planing, no point on the planed surface shall be positioned more than 15 mm below a 3 m straightedge placed on the planed surface in any direction.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Any exposed longitudinal edges within the trafficked area shall be ramped down at a slope no steeper than 5 horizontal to 1 vertical.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Temporary ramping shall not be steeper than 20 horizontal to 1 vertical for traffic speeds of more than 75 km/h or 10 horizontal to 1 vertical for traffic speeds of 75 km/h or less
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Fulton Hogan Engineer / Foreman/ subcontractor
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
